title: Gross premiums written by leading reinsurers in the U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in billion U.S. dollars for 17 number of Insurers.
The Amount in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurer National Indemnity Company and lowest at Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company.
There is a difference of 26.96 between the maximum Insurer National Indemnity Company and minimum Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurer in the x axis and Amount in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Insurer National Indemnity Company has the highest Amount in billion U.S. dollars and EMC Reinsurance Company has the lowest Amount in billion U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in billion U.S. dollars for 17 number of Insurers.
The Amount in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Insurer National Indemnity Company and lowest at Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company.

Insurer National Indemnity Company is higher than any other Insurers with value 27.12, followed by , and Munich Re America Corp.. Down to Insurer EMC Reinsurance Company with the lowest value 0.16.
The highest value 27.12 at National Indemnity Company is almost 6.9 times larger than the average value 3.93.
